title: Anandam Aghiya
sahitya:
Anandam Aghiya gItam saccidAnanda Om enum nAdam


anupallavi

  tAnandamillAda vEdam para shAntamayamAna bOdham


caraNam    tAnE tAn Ana vinOdam tUya samarasamAna abEdham
nAnilam vAnara sAkSiyAga nalgiDum deiva prasAdam
tittittuLLum tIccuDar vIru shuddha shakti Om engira tAraka amudam
